summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Glassmorphism & Layout functionality. All requested features working correctly including layout selection, theme modes, glass intensity, headline color customization, and container toggle functionality.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate)
Layout selection - 'Centered Stack' setting applied successfully
Glass Intensity - 'High' blur effect applied correctly
Headline Color - Yellow (#FACC15) color picker functionality
Visual verification - Headline positioned OUTSIDE container
Visual verification - Body text positioned INSIDE glass container
Container toggle functionality - Enable/disable glass container
Real-time UI updates for all glassmorphism settings
Tab navigation between CONTENT and DESIGN panels
